alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Cave Creek, New River; Central La Paz; Dripping Springs; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Globe, Miami; Northwest Pinal County; San Carlos; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; Superior; Tonto Basin; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 07 at 7:36AM MST until January 09 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM MST MONDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures in the mid to upper 20s. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Arizona. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 9 AM MST Monday. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 9 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
